interaction.title: Layout composition
interaction.content: Choose tools, viewer options, layers groups, priorities and interactions.

interaction.title: Perform map algebra
interaction.content: Run map algebra with input maps.

interaction.title: Hover inspection
interaction.content: Get cell value or a region's total value in real-time.

interaction.title: Display specific values ranges
interaction.content: Dynamically define the ranges of map values.

interaction.title: Show sankey diagram
interaction.content: Select a transition between two time-series and show that specific transition on the map.

database.title: CSR DATABASE
database.content: All maps publicly available; all maps include comprehensive metadata.

database.title: REMOTE WMS SERVERS
database.content: Easily configure a server to display maps on Mappia or on a GIS software.

database.title: DISPLAY MAPS YOURSELF
database.content: Access maps or tables from online file storage services such as GitHub, Bitbucket and many others as well.

share.title: Step 1) PUBLISH MAPS YOURSELF
share.content: Publish yourself interactive online maps. With few clicks, proccess map to display online and send them to a file storage such as GitHub or BitBucket.

share.title: Step 2) CREATE LAYOUTS YOURSELF
share.content: Create yourself maps presentation and interactions. Create yourself platform layout choosing a selection of maps, elements, tools and interactions.

share.title: Step 3) SHARE PROJECTS
share.content: Share online maps, research results, school projects.

license.title: FREE OF CHARGE
license.content: Completely free for any commercial use except the highcharts library. This library has a limitation in highchart license, please contact them directly.

license.title: EDUCATIONAL
license.content: Completely free for any educational purpose.

license.title: FEATURED EXAMPLES
license.content: Multiple usage examples for each element.
